For those who see error when opening iws "Could not bind socket. Address & port already in use."

Install:
1. Unpack
2. Run AngryBirdsSeasonsInstaller_1.5.1.exe
3. Edit "hosts" file at  #:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\ and add this line:

46.4.182.1 drm-pc.angrybirdsgame.com

and save.
4. Start the game, activate full version, use this key: THET-ALEV-LEFR-USWO
5. Thats it!
